name: Skullsworn

skills.name: Vicious Rip
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 20% chance of placing an extra hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 8 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Cry For Blood
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Also places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Feral Hunter
skills.raw_description: Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 15% on critical hits. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 50% if this Champion kills an enemy.
